name: Minable & Create / ミナクリ
description:
World-building RPG "Minable & Create" is an easy-to-understand 2D screen sandbox game.

● Can be dug
Basically, anything in this world can be dug, broken, and materials can be obtained.
Collect wood, stone, leather, ore (iron, silver, gold)!

● Can be created
The collected materials can be processed to create items, tools, weapons and armor.
The rarer the material, the stronger the effect.
Also, you can freely recreate not only items but also terrain.

● Can be connected
You can "publish" the world you created.
Please try to attract many people to your world.
You can enjoy it even more by playing and connecting with everyone.
* "Multiplayer function" is not implemented in the Early Access version [/ b]

Check the game help page for details!
● Help page
http://www.techno-pixel.com/minacre/help.html
